TopicTitle: My ship was attacked by the Kraken! - And it survived?

Articles.Content:
Well, I was spending the day building a space station in orbit, when while trying to dock the second power ring, this happens.

I don't have any clue how this happened and why did it last so long. Heck, I had to reload a save to continue ahead because it wasn't stopping.

Nice one.

The Kraken works in mysterious ways, is what they say.
